text: The Botswana Football Association (BFA) is the governing body of football in Botswana. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1966 as the Botswana National Football Association (BNFA). It became a member of FIFA and CAF in 1978. Category:1966 establishments in Africa Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Sport in Botswana Category:Organizations based in Botswana
title: Botswana Football Association
